data.question: What is the chemical formula of the compound synthesized in the supporting information?
What type of crystal system does the synthesized compound belong to?
What is the space group of the synthesized compound?

How many measured reflections were there for the synthesized compound?
What is the relationship between the number of measured reflections and the number of reflections with I>2σ(I) for the synthesized compound?
data.answer: The number of reflections with I>2σ(I) (2631) is less than the total number of measured reflections (6326).
